tasks.title: Setup Core Infrastructure with Supabase and Render
tasks.description: Set up the foundational infrastructure using Supabase for database/backend and Render for hosting/deployment.
tasks.details:
1. Create a Supabase project and set up the required database tables: `scrape_results`, `scrape_jobs`, `users`, and `projects`.
2. Configure Supabase Auth for user authentication and authorization.
3. Set up Supabase Storage for large datasets and exports.
4. Create a Render account and configure Web Service for React frontend.
5. Set up API Service on Render for Express.js backend.
6. Configure Cron Jobs on Render for scheduled scraping tasks.
7. Implement CI/CD pipeline connecting GitHub repository to Render for automatic deployments.
8. Set up environment variables and secrets management.
9. Implement basic logging and monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify database connection and table creation with test queries.
2. Test authentication flow with sample user registration and login.
3. Upload and retrieve test files from Storage.
4. Confirm successful deployment of minimal frontend and backend applications.
5. Verify Cron Job execution with a simple scheduled task.
6. Test CI/CD pipeline with a minor code change.
7. Ensure proper environment variable access across services.

subtasks.title: Create and Configure Supabase Project with Database Schema
subtasks.description: Set up a new Supabase project and implement the required database schema with proper relationships and access controls.
subtasks.details:
1. Create a new Supabase project through the Supabase dashboard.
2. Design and implement the database schema with the following tables:
   - `users`: Store user information (id, email, name, created_at)
   - `projects`: Store project details (id, name, description, user_id, created_at)
   - `scrape_jobs`: Store scraping job configurations (id, project_id, name, url_pattern, frequency, status, created_at)
   - `scrape_results`: Store scraping results (id, scrape_job_id, data, status, created_at)
3. Set up appropriate relationships between tables (foreign keys).
4. Configure Row Level Security (RLS) policies to ensure users can only access their own data.
5. Create database indexes for performance optimization.
6. Test the schema by inserting and querying sample data through the Supabase interface.
7. Document the database schema and relationships.

subtasks.title: Implement Supabase Authentication and Storage
subtasks.description: Configure Supabase Auth for user authentication and set up Supabase Storage for handling large datasets and exports.
subtasks.details:
1. Enable and configure Supabase Auth with email/password authentication.
2. Set up OAuth providers if needed (Google, GitHub).
3. Configure email templates for verification, password reset, etc.
4. Create custom user profiles linked to the users table.
5. Set up Supabase Storage buckets:
   - `exports`: For storing generated data exports
   - `datasets`: For storing large scraped datasets
6. Configure appropriate bucket permissions using RLS.
7. Implement test cases for user registration, login, and profile management.
8. Create helper functions for common auth operations (signup, login, password reset).
9. Test file uploads and downloads to/from storage buckets.

subtasks.title: Set Up Render Web Service for Frontend Deployment
subtasks.description: Create and configure a Render Web Service for hosting the React frontend application with proper environment configuration.
subtasks.details:
1. Create a Render account if not already available.
2. Set up a new Web Service on Render for the React frontend.
3. Configure the build settings:
   - Build command: `npm install && npm run build`
   - Start command: `npm start`
   - Node version: Select appropriate version
4. Set up environment variables:
   - `REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL`
   - `REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY`
   - Other frontend-specific environment variables
5. Configure auto-deploy from the GitHub repository.
6. Set up a custom domain if available.
7. Configure HTTPS and SSL certificates.
8. Test the deployment with a simple React app that connects to Supabase.
9. Set up proper caching and CDN settings for optimal performance.

subtasks.title: Deploy Express.js Backend as Render API Service
subtasks.description: Set up and configure a Render API Service for the Express.js backend with proper connection to Supabase.
subtasks.details:
1. Create a new API Service on Render for the Express.js backend.
2. Configure the build settings:
   - Build command: `npm install`
   - Start command: `node server.js` (or appropriate entry point)
   - Node version: Select appropriate version
3. Set up environment variables:
   - `SUPABASE_URL`
   - `SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY`
   - `JWT_SECRET`
   - Other backend-specific environment variables
4. Configure auto-deploy from the GitHub repository.
5. Set up health check endpoints.
6. Implement basic Express.js server with Supabase connection.
7. Create API routes for authentication and basic data operations.
8. Test the API endpoints using Postman or similar tool.
9. Implement proper error handling and logging middleware.

subtasks.title: Configure Render Cron Jobs and CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Set up scheduled scraping tasks using Render Cron Jobs and implement a complete CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment.
subtasks.details:
1. Create Render Cron Jobs for scheduled scraping tasks:
   - Configure job frequency (hourly, daily, etc.)
   - Set up the command to trigger scraping endpoints
   - Configure appropriate timeout settings
2. Implement CI/CD pipeline:
   - Set up GitHub Actions workflow for testing
   - Configure automatic deployment to Render on successful merges to main branch
   - Set up staging and production environments if needed
3. Implement comprehensive logging:
   - Set up a logging service (e.g., Render logs, external service)
   - Configure log retention policies
   - Implement structured logging in the application
4. Set up monitoring:
   - Configure uptime monitoring
   - Set up performance monitoring
   - Implement alerts for critical errors
5. Test the complete infrastructure:
   - Verify scheduled jobs are running correctly
   - Test the entire deployment pipeline
   - Validate logging and monitoring functionality

tasks.title: Implement Decodo Scraping API Integration
tasks.description: Create a wrapper around the Decodo Scraping API to handle data collection from multiple platforms.
tasks.details:
1. Create a service module to interact with the Decodo Scraping API.
2. Implement functions for making API requests with appropriate parameters:
   - `url`: Target URL to scrape
   - `headless`: Rendering mode (html or browser)
   - `geo`: Location for geo-targeting
   - `locale`: Language for the request
   - `device_type`: Type of device and browser
   - `session_id`: Session ID for reusing sessions
3. Develop error handling and retry mechanisms.
4. Create a job scheduling system using Supabase for queue management.
5. Implement logging for all API interactions.
6. Create utility functions for common scraping patterns.
7. Set up rate limiting to comply with API usage limits.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test API connectivity with simple scraping requests.
2. Verify correct parameter passing and response handling.
3. Simulate API failures to test error handling and retry logic.
4. Test job scheduling by creating and monitoring sample scraping jobs.
5. Verify logging captures all relevant information.
6. Benchmark performance with different parameter combinations.
7. Test rate limiting by simulating high-volume requests.

tasks.title: Develop Platform-Specific Scraping Modules
tasks.description: Create specialized modules for scraping Reddit, Amazon, Instagram/TikTok, and Trustpilot using the Decodo API.
tasks.details:
1. Develop the Reddit scraping module:
   - Implement functions to navigate subreddits and extract posts/comments
   - Create data structures for storing Reddit-specific data points
   - Add filtering by relevance and date

2. Develop the Amazon Reviews scraping module:
   - Implement functions to navigate product pages and extract reviews
   - Create data structures for storing review data
   - Add filtering by star rating

3. Develop the Instagram/TikTok scraping module:
   - Implement functions to search by hashtags and extract posts/videos
   - Create data structures for storing social media content
   - Handle different media types appropriately

4. Develop the Trustpilot scraping module:
   - Implement functions to navigate company pages and extract reviews
   - Create data structures for storing review data
   - Add filtering by date and rating

5. Create a unified interface for all scraping modules.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test each platform module with sample URLs to verify data extraction.
2. Validate the structure and completeness of extracted data against expected schema.
3. Test filtering mechanisms to ensure they correctly limit data collection.
4. Verify handling of pagination and "load more" functionality.
5. Test error scenarios specific to each platform.
6. Validate the unified interface works consistently across all modules.
7. Perform integration tests combining multiple platform scrapes.

tasks.title: Implement NLP Processing Pipeline
tasks.description: Develop the natural language processing pipeline for analyzing and extracting insights from scraped data.
tasks.details:
1. Implement text normalization and cleaning functions:
   - Remove HTML tags, special characters, and irrelevant content
   - Handle Unicode and encoding issues
   - Normalize text case and spacing

2. Implement language detection and translation where necessary.

3. Create tokenization and lemmatization pipeline:
   - Split text into tokens
   - Reduce words to their base forms
   - Handle domain-specific terminology

4. Implement POS-tagging to identify parts of speech.

5. Add Named Entity Recognition to identify products, brands, and other entities.

6. Create a pipeline orchestrator to process data in batches.

7. Implement caching mechanisms for processed data.

8. Set up storage of processed results in Supabase.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test text normalization with various input formats and verify output cleanliness.
2. Validate language detection accuracy with multi-language samples.
3. Test tokenization and lemmatization with domain-specific text samples.
4. Verify POS-tagging accuracy against known-good examples.
5. Test Named Entity Recognition with e-commerce specific content.
6. Benchmark processing pipeline performance with large datasets.
7. Verify correct storage of processed results in the database.

tasks.title: Develop Sentiment Analysis and Insight Extraction
tasks.description: Create modules for sentiment analysis and extraction of pains, desires, and language patterns from processed data.
tasks.details:
1. Implement multi-level sentiment classification:
   - Positive/negative/neutral classification
   - Emotional intensity scoring
   - Aspect-based sentiment analysis

2. Develop pains and desires extraction:
   - Problem statement identification patterns
   - Desire statement recognition patterns
   - Frustration pattern detection
   - Aspiration pattern recognition

3. Implement language pattern analysis:
   - Domain-specific terminology extraction
   - Phrase mining for common expressions
   - Jargon identification
   - Colloquial expression detection
   - Word frequency analysis

4. Create clustering and categorization of extracted insights:
   - Group similar pains/desires
   - Categorize by themes
   - Rank by frequency and intensity

5. Implement storage of analysis results in structured format.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test sentiment analysis against benchmark datasets and human-labeled samples.
2. Validate pain/desire extraction with known examples from e-commerce reviews.
3. Test language pattern analysis with domain-specific content.
4. Verify clustering accuracy by comparing automated groupings with manual ones.
5. Test end-to-end pipeline with sample data from all platforms.
6. Validate storage format allows for efficient querying and visualization.
7. Perform user testing to verify insights are meaningful and actionable.

tasks.title: Implement Market Research and Analysis Module
tasks.description: Develop functionality for market research, trend identification, and competitive analysis.
tasks.details:
1. Implement market size and growth analysis:
   - Data collection for market metrics
   - Growth trend calculation
   - Segmentation analysis

2. Develop trend monitoring functionality:
   - Identify emerging keywords and topics
   - Track sentiment changes over time
   - Monitor engagement metrics

3. Create price analysis features:
   - Collect and analyze pricing data
   - Generate price positioning maps
   - Identify optimal price points

4. Implement competitor analysis:
   - Competitor messaging analysis
   - SWOT analysis generation
   - Gap-opportunity identification
   - Social media performance comparison

5. Develop data visualization components for market insights.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test market size calculations with known market data.
2. Validate trend identification against manually identified trends.
3. Test price analysis with sample product data.
4. Verify competitor analysis produces meaningful insights with test cases.
5. Test visualization components with sample data.
6. Perform integration testing of the entire market analysis pipeline.
7. Conduct user testing to verify insights are valuable and actionable.

tasks.title: Develop AI-driven Recommendations Engine
tasks.description: Create an AI system that generates actionable recommendations based on the analyzed data.
tasks.details:
1. Implement marketing angle suggestion algorithm:
   - Generate recommendations based on identified pains and desires
   - Prioritize angles by potential impact
   - Provide supporting data for each suggestion

2. Develop copywriting recommendation system:
   - Generate language suggestions based on audience terminology
   - Create templates for different marketing contexts
   - Provide tone and style guidance

3. Implement UGC script template generation:
   - Create structured templates for user-generated content
   - Incorporate high-engagement phrases and topics
   - Customize for different platforms

4. Develop email marketing strategy recommendations:
   - Generate sequence suggestions
   - Provide subject line recommendations
   - Suggest content focus for each email

5. Implement product page optimization suggestions:
   - Identify key selling points to highlight
   - Suggest improvements based on competitor analysis
   - Recommend terminology and framing
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test recommendation quality with expert evaluation.
2. Validate marketing angle suggestions against known successful campaigns.
3. Test copywriting recommendations with A/B testing scenarios.
4. Verify UGC templates against high-performing content examples.
5. Test email marketing recommendations against industry benchmarks.
6. Perform user testing to gather feedback on recommendation quality.
7. Implement metrics to track recommendation effectiveness over time.

tasks.title: Build Dashboard and Visualization Components
tasks.description: Develop the frontend dashboard with interactive visualizations for presenting insights and recommendations.
tasks.details:
1. Design and implement the dashboard layout with React and Material-UI:
   - Create responsive grid system
   - Implement navigation and user interface components
   - Design consistent styling system

2. Develop audience insights visualization components:
   - Top 10 pains/desires clustered visualizations
   - Sentiment analysis charts
   - Word cloud for audience terminology
   - Marketing angle recommendation cards

3. Create market analysis visualization components:
   - Market size and growth charts
   - Segment analysis graphs
   - Trend forecast visualizations
   - Price positioning maps

4. Implement competition analysis visualizations:
   - Competitor comparison tables
   - SWOT analysis displays
   - Gap analysis charts
   - Price comparison graphs

5. Develop content strategy visualization components:
   - Marketing message displays
   - Email sequence visualizations
   - UGC script template cards
   - Product page optimization suggestions

6. Implement interactive filtering and exploration features.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test responsive design across different device sizes.
2. Validate visualization accuracy with test datasets.
3. Test interactive features like filtering and drilling down.
4. Verify accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 standards.
5. Perform usability testing with potential users.
6. Test performance with large datasets.
7. Verify cross-browser compatibility.

tasks.title: Implement User Management and Authentication
tasks.description: Develop user management, authentication, and authorization systems using Supabase Auth.
tasks.details:
1. Implement user registration and login flows using Supabase Auth:
   - Email/password authentication
   - Social login options
   - Email verification
   - Password reset functionality

2. Create user profile management:
   - Profile information editing
   - Notification preferences
   - Account settings

3. Implement role-based access control:
   - Define user roles (admin, standard user, etc.)
   - Set up permission structures
   - Implement access control checks

4. Develop project management functionality:
   - Create/edit/delete projects
   - Project settings configuration
   - User assignment to projects

5. Implement session management and security features:
   - JWT handling
   - Session timeout
   - Security logging

6. Create admin dashboard for user management.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test registration and login flows with various scenarios.
2. Validate email verification and password reset functionality.
3. Test role-based access with different user types.
4. Verify project management operations work correctly.
5. Test security features like session timeout and invalid token handling.
6. Perform security testing for common authentication vulnerabilities.
7. Test admin functionality for user management.

tasks.title: Implement End-to-End Testing and Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive testing suite and optimize performance across the entire application.
tasks.details:
1. Implement end-to-end testing suite:
   - Create test scenarios covering core user journeys
   - Set up automated testing with Cypress or similar tool
   - Implement API testing for backend endpoints

2. Perform performance optimization:
   - Identify and resolve frontend performance bottlenecks
   - Optimize database queries and indexing
   - Implement caching strategies
   - Optimize API response times

3. Implement monitoring and logging:
   - Set up error tracking and reporting
   - Implement performance monitoring
   - Create usage analytics

4. Conduct security audits:
   - Perform vulnerability scanning
   - Review authentication and authorization
   - Test for common security issues

5. Implement data compliance measures:
   - Ensure GDPR and CCPA compliance
   - Implement data retention policies
   - Create privacy documentation

6. Prepare deployment pipeline for production.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Run end-to-end tests across all core user journeys.
2. Benchmark performance before and after optimization.
3. Test monitoring by simulating errors and performance issues.
4. Verify security with penetration testing and vulnerability scanning.
5. Test compliance features with sample data.
6. Perform load testing to verify scalability.
7. Conduct user acceptance testing with stakeholders.

tasks.title: Test, Optimaliseer en Documenteer TopicAwareness Componenten
tasks.description: Voer uitgebreide tests uit, optimaliseer de prestaties en verbeter de documentatie van de TopicAwareness componenten.

tasks.title: Verbeter Help Systeem in MarketPulse AI
tasks.description: Implementeer een uitgebreid help systeem in de MarketPulse AI applicatie om gebruikers te ondersteunen bij het gebruik van alle functionaliteiten.

subtasks.title: Integreer IntegratedHelpSystem in Alle Pagina's
subtasks.description: Integreer de bestaande IntegratedHelpSystem component in alle belangrijke pagina's van de MarketPulse AI applicatie om een consistente help-ervaring te bieden.
subtasks.details:
- Identificeer alle belangrijke pagina's in de applicatie die nog geen help-functionaliteit hebben
- Integreer de IntegratedHelpSystem component in elke pagina
- Zorg voor de juiste activeView parameter voor elke pagina
- Test de integratie op alle pagina's
- Zorg voor consistente styling en positionering van help-elementen

subtasks.title: Implementeer Contextuele Tooltips voor UI-Elementen
subtasks.description: Voeg ContextualTooltip componenten toe aan belangrijke UI-elementen in de applicatie om gebruikers contextuele hulp te bieden bij specifieke functionaliteiten.
subtasks.details:
- Identificeer belangrijke UI-elementen die contextuele hulp nodig hebben
- Implementeer ContextualTooltip componenten voor deze elementen
- Schrijf relevante en duidelijke help-content voor elke tooltip
- Zorg voor consistente styling en gedrag van tooltips
- Test de tooltips op verschillende schermformaten
- Zorg voor toegankelijkheid volgens WCAG-richtlijnen

subtasks.title: Verbeter Feedback Mechanisme voor Help Content
subtasks.description: Verbeter het bestaande HelpFeedback component en integreer het in alle help-elementen om gebruikersfeedback te verzamelen en de help-content te verbeteren.
subtasks.details:
- Analyseer het bestaande HelpFeedback component
- Verbeter de gebruikerservaring van het feedback formulier
- Implementeer een systeem om feedback te verzamelen en op te slaan in Supabase
- Voeg analytics tracking toe voor feedback interacties
- Integreer het feedback mechanisme in alle help-elementen
- Implementeer een dashboard voor het bekijken en analyseren van feedback

subtasks.title: Personaliseer Help Content op Basis van Gebruikersrol en Ervaringsniveau
subtasks.description: Implementeer een systeem om help-content aan te passen op basis van de gebruikersrol en het ervaringsniveau van de gebruiker.
subtasks.details:
- Analyseer het bestaande personalisatiesysteem in de IntegratedHelpSystem
- Verbeter de logica voor het selecteren van de juiste help-content op basis van gebruikersrol
- Implementeer verschillende niveaus van detail in help-content voor verschillende ervaringsniveaus
- Voeg gebruikersinstellingen toe voor het aanpassen van help-voorkeuren
- Test de personalisatie met verschillende gebruikersrollen en ervaringsniveaus
- Implementeer A/B-testen om de effectiviteit van verschillende help-methoden te meten

subtasks.title: Ontwikkel en Verbeter Help Content
subtasks.description: Ontwikkel nieuwe en verbeter bestaande help-content voor alle functionaliteiten in de applicatie, inclusief FAQ items, video tutorials en contextuele help-teksten.
subtasks.details:
- Analyseer de bestaande help-content in helpData.js en helpPointsData.js
- Identificeer hiaten in de bestaande help-content
- Schrijf nieuwe FAQ items voor veelgestelde vragen
- Maak een plan voor video tutorials voor complexe functionaliteiten
- Verbeter bestaande help-teksten voor duidelijkheid en relevantie
- Zorg voor consistente toon en stijl in alle help-content
- Implementeer een systeem voor het eenvoudig bijwerken van help-content

tasks.title: PRD Bijwerken voor Help-Functionaliteit
tasks.description: Werk de Product Requirements Document (PRD) bij om de nieuwe help-functionaliteit te documenteren, zodat toekomstige ontwikkelaars begrijpen wat er is ge誰mplementeerd.
tasks.details:
Deze taak omvat het bijwerken van de PRD met:
1. Gedetailleerde beschrijving van de ge誰mplementeerde help-componenten (IntegratedHelpSystem, HelpOverlayManager, ContextualTooltip, OnboardingWizard, HelpFeedback, UserExperienceFeedback)
2. Technische architectuur en datamodellen voor de help-functionaliteit
3. API endpoints en datastructuren
4. Gebruikersstromen en interacties
5. Toekomstige uitbreidingen en verbeteringen

De bijgewerkte PRD moet voldoende gedetailleerd zijn om nieuwe ontwikkelaars te helpen begrijpen hoe de help-functionaliteit is ge誰mplementeerd en hoe deze kan worden uitgebreid.

tasks.title: Gebruikerstesten voor Help-Functionaliteit
tasks.description: Voer gebruikerstesten uit om te controleren of de help-functionaliteit intu誰tief is en of gebruikers de informatie kunnen vinden die ze nodig hebben.
tasks.details:
Deze taak omvat:
1. Opstellen van testscenario's voor verschillende gebruikersrollen en ervaringsniveaus
2. Rekruteren van testgebruikers die representatief zijn voor de doelgroep
3. Uitvoeren van gebruikerstesten met focus op:
   - Vindbaarheid van help-informatie
   - Duidelijkheid van help-content
   - Effectiviteit van onboarding
   - Gebruiksvriendelijkheid van feedback mechanismen
4. Verzamelen en analyseren van testresultaten
5. Identificeren van verbeterpunten en prioriteren van aanpassingen

De testresultaten moeten worden gedocumenteerd in een rapport met concrete aanbevelingen voor verbeteringen.

tasks.title: Interne Documentatie voor Help-Functionaliteit
tasks.description: Maak interne documentatie voor het onderhouden en uitbreiden van de help-functionaliteit.
tasks.details:
Deze taak omvat het maken van:
1. Technische documentatie voor ontwikkelaars, inclusief:
   - Componentstructuur en architectuur
   - API documentatie
   - Datamodellen en database schema's
   - Richtlijnen voor het toevoegen van nieuwe help-content
2. Gebruikershandleidingen voor eindgebruikers, inclusief:
   - Hoe de help-functionaliteit te gebruiken
   - Beschrijving van beschikbare help-methoden
   - FAQ sectie
3. Onderhouds- en uitbreidingsdocumentatie:
   - Procedures voor het bijwerken van help-content
   - Richtlijnen voor het toevoegen van nieuwe help-componenten
   - Best practices voor het schrijven van effectieve help-teksten

De documentatie moet worden opgeslagen in een centrale locatie die toegankelijk is voor alle teamleden en moet regelmatig worden bijgewerkt om in lijn te blijven met de codebase.

tasks.title: Ontwikkelen van Feedback Analyse-Dashboard
tasks.description: Ontwikkel een dashboard voor het analyseren van de verzamelde gebruikersfeedback, zodat we de help-content kunnen blijven verbeteren op basis van gebruikerservaringen.
tasks.details:
Deze taak omvat:
1. Ontwerpen van een dashboard UI met:
   - Visualisaties voor feedback trends
   - Filters voor verschillende help-componenten, pagina's en gebruikersrollen
   - Detailweergave voor individuele feedback items
2. Implementeren van de backend functionaliteit:
   - API endpoints voor het ophalen van geaggregeerde feedback data
   - Berekening van relevante metrics (bijv. tevredenheidsscores, meest bekeken help-items)
   - Exportfunctionaliteit voor rapportages
3. Integreren met bestaande analytics systemen
4. Implementeren van automatische notificaties voor negatieve feedback
5. Toevoegen van functionaliteit voor het prioriteren van verbeteringen op basis van feedback

Het dashboard moet toegankelijk zijn voor product managers en ontwikkelaars en moet helpen bij het identificeren van gebieden waar de help-functionaliteit kan worden verbeterd.
